item.title: Formatting
item.description: Formatting Basic syntax Element Markdown syntax Bold **Bold** Italic _Italic_ Strikethrough ~~Strikethrough~~ inline code `inline code` Link [Link](https://google.com/), [Link](/site/url) - Image ![Image](https://google.com/logo.png), ![Image title](/image/url) Ordered Lists First item Second item First Sub-item Second Sub-item Third item 1. First item 1. Second item 1. First Sub-item 1.

item.title: Code Highlight
item.description: Code Highlight Examples Inline code print(x + "a") example # Bash example function show_help() { echo "Usage: script.sh <param> param - Parameter " } show_help "${HOST}"# Python example def sum(a, b): return a + b def main(): result = sum(1, 2) print("result: {0}".format(result)) main() Usage Inline code `print(x + "a")` example ```python # Python example def sum(a, b): return a + b def main(): result = sum(1, 2) print("result: {0}"
